scripts.build:clean:unix: npm run clean:unix && npm install --force && npm run build
scripts.build:clean:windows: npm run clean:windows && npm install --force && npm run build
scripts.clean:windows: npm run clean:windows:dist && npm run clean:windows:node_modules:project && npm run clean:windows:node_modules:root
scripts.publish:official: npm run build && npm publish projects/angular-sdk/dist
scripts.publish:dry: npm run build && npm publish projects/angular-sdk/dist --dry-run
scripts.publish:rc: npm run build && npm publish projects/angular-sdk/dist --tag rc
scripts.publish:rc-dry: npm run build && npm publish projects/angular-sdk/dist --tag rc --dry-run
